parameters.name: RuleConfig
parameters.description:
The new configurations of the protection rule.

> After you modify the configurations of the protection rule, the previous configurations are overwritten.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the protection rule. You can specify only one ID in each request.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The new name of the protection rule.

parameters.name: RuleStatus
parameters.description:
The new status of the protection rule. Valid values:

*   **on**
*   **off**
